Feature.Name: Basket feature
Feature.Description: In order to buy products As a customer I want to add products to basket

Step.Name: GIVEN product is out of stock

StepName.Format: product is out of stock

Step.Name: WHEN customer adds it to the basket

StepName.Format: customer adds it to the basket

Step.Name: THEN the product addition should be unsuccessful

StepName.Format: the product addition should be unsuccessful

Step.Name: AND the basket should not contain the product

StepName.Format: the basket should not contain the product

Scenario.Name: Successful addition

Step.Name: GIVEN product is in stock

StepName.Format: product is in stock

Step.Name: WHEN customer adds it to the basket

StepName.Format: customer adds it to the basket

Step.Name: THEN the product addition should be successful

StepName.Format: the product addition should be successful

Step.Name: AND the basket should contain the product

StepName.Format: the basket should contain the product

Step.Name: AND the product should be removed from stock
Step.StatusDetails: Product removal from stock is not implemented yet

Feature.Name: Contacts management
Feature.Description: In order to maintain my contact book As an application user I want to add, browse and remove my contacts

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to add multiple contacts

Step.Name: CTX Given my contact book is empty

StepName.Format: Given my contact book is empty

Step.Name: AND When I add new contacts

StepName.Format: When I add new contacts

Step.Name: AND Then all contacts should be available in the contact book

StepName.Format: Then all contacts should be available in the contact book

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove all contacts

Step.Name: CTX Given my contact book is filled with many contacts

StepName.Format: Given my contact book is filled with many contacts

Step.Name: AND When I clear it
Step.StatusDetails: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

StepName.Format: When I clear it

Step.Name: AND Then the contact book should be empty

StepName.Format: Then the contact book should be empty

Scenario.StatusDetails: Step 2: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove contacts

Step.Name: CTX Given my contact book is filled with contacts

StepName.Format: Given my contact book is filled with contacts

Step.Name: AND When I remove one contact

StepName.Format: When I remove one contact

Step.Name: AND Then the contact book should not contain removed contact any more

StepName.Format: Then the contact book should not contain removed contact any more

Step.Name: AND Then the contact book should contains all other contacts

StepName.Format: Then the contact book should contains all other contacts

Feature.Name: Product spedition feature
Feature.Description: In order to deliver products to customer effectively As a spedition manager I want to dispatch products to customer as soon as the payment is finalized

Scenario.Name: Should dispatch product after payment is finalized

Step.Name: GIVEN There is an active customer with id "ABC-123"

StepName.Format: There is an active customer with id "{0}"

Step.Name: AND The customer has product "wooden shelf" in basket

StepName.Format: The customer has product "{0}" in basket

Step.Name: AND The customer has product "wooden desk" in basket

StepName.Format: The customer has product "{0}" in basket

Step.Name: WHEN The customer payment finalizes

StepName.Format: The customer payment finalizes

Step.Name: THEN Product "wooden shelf" should be dispatched to the customer

StepName.Format: Product "{0}" should be dispatched to the customer

Step.Name: AND Product "wooden desk" should be dispatched to the customer

StepName.Format: Product "{0}" should be dispatched to the customer
